name: Search_Flights

fromId.description: From/Departure location Id. fromId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

toId.description: To/Arrival location Id. toId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

departDate.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

stops.description:
Filters flights based on the number of stops. Accepted values are:
none for no preference (returns flights with any number of stops)
0 for non-stop flights
1 for one-stop flights
2 for two-stop flights
If provided, the value must be either none, 0, 1, or 2.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

response_summary:
There are 203 available flights from Mumbai to New Delhi, with prices starting at $67.71 USD. The flights are offered by three main airlines: Air India, IndiGo, and Etihad Airways. Air India has the most options with 115 flights, while IndiGo offers 55 flights at the lowest starting price of $67.71. Etihad Airways, though pricier at $336.36, provides 23 flight options.  

Most flights are non-stop (51 options) or have one stop (195 options), with the cheapest fares available across all stop categories. The flight durations range from 2 to 30 hours, with departures spread throughout the day—early morning (00:35–05:59), late morning (06:00–11:59), and afternoon (12:00–17:59).  

Baggage policies vary by airline, with most flights including one checked bag (up to 33.1 lbs) and one cabin bag (up to 15.4 lbs). The best-rated flights are priced at $67.74, with IndiGo's options being both the cheapest and fastest.  

Travelers can filter flights by stops, airlines, or departure times, and flexible ticket options are available for an additional $11.80. The search is tailored for economy-class passengers, with family travelers and short-haul trips being key segments.  

For more details on baggage policies, travelers can refer to the respective airline websites:  
- **Air India**: [Baggage Policy](http://www.airindia.in/baggage.htm)  
- **IndiGo**: [Baggage Policy](https://www.goindigo.in/baggage.html)  
- **Etihad Airways**: [Baggage Policy](http://www.etihad.com/en-se/before-you-fly/baggage-information)
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for flight booking and travel planning. It searches available flights between specified departure and arrival locations, with options to filter by stops, cabin class, and sort by best, cheapest, or fastest flights. Users receive detailed flight information including pricing, airlines, duration, and baggage policies. The location IDs must be obtained from the SearchDestination API.

enhanced_parameters.returnDate: Date of return for round-trip flights.
enhanced_parameters.stops: Filters flights by number of stops (non-stop, one-stop, etc.).
enhanced_parameters.pageNo: Pagination number for flight search results.
enhanced_parameters.children: Number and ages of child passengers (under 18).
enhanced_parameters.sort: Sorts flights by best, cheapest, or fastest options.
enhanced_parameters.cabinClass: Filters flights by cabin class (economy, business, etc.).
